articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: As mpox quickly fades in the US, observers wonder who deserves the credit? - Omineca Express
articles.description: Less than six months ago, mpox was an exploding health crisis. What had been an obscure disease from Africa was ripping through European and U.S. gay communities. Precious doses of an unproven vaccine were in short supply. International officials declared …
